articles.title: Players must be vaccinated for Australian Open, says tournament chief - CNA
articles.description:
MELBOURNE: All players at the Australian Open must be vaccinated against COVID-19, tournament chief Craig Tiley confirmed on Saturday (Nov 20), piling more pressure on world number one Novak Djokovic, who has refused to reveal if he has been inoculated.
